type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.test.TestProgressEvent
type.description: * Root interface for all events that signal progress while executing a test or test suite. * * @since 2.4

method.name: getDescriptor
method.description: * Returns the description of the test for which progress is reported. For JVM-based tests, * the descriptor is of sub-type {@code JvmTestOperationDescriptor}. * * @return The description of the underlying test operation.

property.name: descriptor
property.description: * Returns the description of the test for which progress is reported. For JVM-based tests, * the descriptor is of sub-type {@code JvmTestOperationDescriptor}. * * @return The description of the underlying test operation.
